snippet: The series begins with the Nelson Riddle Orchestra doing a tribute to Frank Sinatra and Ella Fitzgerald on June 26 in the band shell at Damrosch Park in Manhattan.
abstract: The series begins with the Nelson Riddle Orchestra doing a tribute to Frank Sinatra and Ella Fitzgerald on June 26 in the band shell at Damrosch Park in Manhattan.

headline.main: Midsummer Night Swing Unveils Its Lineup
headline.print_headline: European Boogie-Woogie Band to Join Midsummer Night Swing
